PREFERENCES.ALL_ACCOUNT_DATA: All account data can be exported to a "Tar-GZipped" (.tgz) format which can be imported back into the system.
PREFERENCES.CALENDAR_INFO: You can export your appointments in the standard iCalendar (.ics) format, then import them into another calendar program. See documentation in the other program for help in importing.
PREFERENCES.CHOOSE_WHAT_APPEARS: Choose what appears in the "From" field of email messages
PREFERENCES.CONTACT_INFO: You can export your contacts in the standard "Comma-Separated Values" (.csv) format, then import them into another contact manager program. See documentation in the other program for help in importing.
PREFERENCES.DISPLAY_CHECKBOXES: Display checkboxes to select item in lists
PREFERENCES.DISPLAY_NAMES: Display names in place of email addresses when available
PREFERENCES.PEACE_IN_INBOX: Place in Inbox if I'm in To: or Cc:
PREFERENCES.AUTOMATICALLY_DELETE: Automatically delete duplicate copies of the same message when received
PREFERENCES.AUTOMATICALLY_SAVE: Automatically save drafts of messages while you are composing
PREFERENCES.SPELL_CHECK: Mandatory spellcheck before sending a message.
PREFERENCES.SAVE_SEND_COPY: Save a copy to Sent folder
PREFERENCES.WHEN_MESSAGE_ACCESSED: When messages are accessed via POP
PREFERENCES.DOWNLOAD_ALL_MAIL: Download all mail, including old mail
PREFERENCES.ONLY_DOWNLOAD_NEW: Only download new mail beginning now
PREFERENCES.COMPLETELY_REMOVE_DELETED_MESSAGE: Completely remove the incoming Deleted messages.  This is the Standard behavior for POP3.
PREFERENCES.MOVE_DELETED_MESSAGES: Move incoming Deleted messages to the Trash, and mark them as read.
PREFERENCES.MARK_LEAVE_DELETED_MESSAGES: Mark all incoming messages as read, and leave the incoming Deleted messages in the Inbox.
PREFERENCES.LEAVE_DELETED_MESSAGES: Leave incoming Deleted messages in the Inbox.
PREFERENCES.INCLUDE_MESSAGE_AS_ATTACHMENT: Include original message as an attachment
PREFERENCES.WHEN_I_RECEIVE_REQUEST: When I receive a request for a read receipt
PREFERENCES.WHEN_I_RECEIVE_MESSAGE: When I receive a message originally sent by me
PREFERENCES.DONT_KEEP_LOCAL_COPY: Don't keep a local copy of messages
PREFERENCES.DONT_SAVE_SENT_FOLDER: Don't save a copy of sent messages
PREFERENCES.ENTER_EMAIL: Enter email addresses separated by commas or semi-colons
PREFERENCES.ENTER_FOLDER: Enter folder names separated by commas or semi-colons
PREFERENCES.FOLDERS_SHARED_WITH_ME: Folders shared with me that I have accepted
PREFERENCES.FOLDER_NOT_YET_ACCEPTED: Folders that have been shared with me but not yet accepted
PREFERENCES.FOLLOWING_USERS: The following users have delegated authority to this account
PREFERENCES.INITIALLY_ADDRESSES_GLOBAL: Include addresses in the Global Address List
PREFERENCES.INITIALLY_SEARCH: Initially search the Global Address List when using the contact picker
PREFERENCES.INTRO: Use personas to quickly change many settings when sending email messages. For example, if you sometimes send email in a particular role at work, create a persona for that role.
PREFERENCES.MAIL_FROM_THESE_ADDRESSES: Mail from these addresses or domains will be considered trusted and images will automatically be displayed
PREFERENCES.NAME: Name
PREFERENCES.SAVE_DELEGATE_MY_SENT_FOLDER: Save a copy of sent messages to delegate's Sent folder and my Sent folder
PREFERENCES.SAVE_DELEGATE_SENT_FOLDER: Save a copy of sent messages to delegate's Sent folder
PREFERENCES.SAVE_SENT_FOLDER: Save a copy of sent messages to my Sent folder
PREFERENCES.SELECT_AUTOCOMPLETE: Select autocomplete match when a comma is typed
PREFERENCES.SET_REPLY_TO: Set the "Reply-to" field of email messages to
PREFERENCES.SHOW_ADVANCED_SEARCH_LANGUAGE: Show advanced search language in search toolbar
PREFERENCES.SHOW_FOLDERS_DISTRIBUTION_LIST: Show folders shared with me through a distribution list
PREFERENCES.SHOW_FOLDERS_FOLLOWING_USER: Show folders shared with me by the following user
PREFERENCES.TO_SHARE_A_FOLDER: To share a folder, choose the type and then press the "Share" button
PREFERENCES.WHEN_COMPOSING: When composing, replying to or forwarding messages in folder(s)
PREFERENCES.WHEN_REPLYING: When replying or forwarding messages sent to

USER_ABOUT.FIRST: VNC entwickelt leistungsfähige Commercial Open Source Softwarelösungen, die es Unternehmen erlauben, vorhandenes Potenzial optimal zu nutzen. Dabei sind unsere Lösungen nicht nur deutlich günstiger als vergleichbare kommerzielle Angebote, sondern auch sicherer - in mehrfacher Hinsicht.
USER_ABOUT.SECOND: Die browser-basierte Architektur und flexible Schnittstellen erlauben den Zugriff auf Daten und Anwendungen unabhängig davon, wo Sie sich befinden oder welches Gerät Sie nutzen. Sämtliche Daten lassen sich gemeinsam mit Mitarbeitern, Partnern oder Lieferanten nutzen, wobei Informationen nur dort ankommen, wo sie vorgesehen sind.
USER_ABOUT.THIRD: Unsere Produktangebote beinhalten alles von der sicheren Kommunikation und dem Kontaktmanagement bis hin zu Marketing, Produktion, ERP und Projektmanagement. Unsere gesamte Produktpalette ist komplett web-basiert, plattformunabhängig und auf nahezu jedem Gerät nutzbar.
